mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kb_task(id,summary, content, order_number, reporter, entry_id) VALUES (#{id},#{summary}, #{content}, (SELECT max_order_number from (SELECT CASE WHEN max(order_number) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE max(order_number)+1 end as max_order_number FROM kb_task WHERE entry_id=#{entryId} ) as t ), #{reporter}, #{entryId})
mapper.update: UPDATE kb_task SET summary = #{task.summary}, content = #{task.content}, order_number = #{task.orderNumber}, reporter = #{task.reporter}, entry_id = #{task.entryId} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM kb_task WHERE entry_id= #{entry_id} AND delete_status=0 ORDER BY order_number
mapper.delete: UPDATE kb_task SET delete_status=1 WHERE id=#{id}
